items.title: dVox
items.desc: A decentralized application built to share thought anonymously using one of the most secured techonology: Ethereum blockchain. Built by K students to voice your thoughts.

items.title: Ocean Whisper
items.desc: Ocean Whisper is a Real Time Strategy Game that simulates ocean pollution from dumping and how it affects us and the economy. It was built during Cypher VII hackathon.

items.title: Project VBW
items.desc: The internet, in its entirety, contributes strongly to the degradation of the environment. The goal of the project is to formalize information regarding the energy use and related carbon emissions.
